update mro_line_technology_status_station
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber + c.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber + c.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber) ,0)AS totalTrackQuduanQuantity, IFNULL(SUM(c.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber) ,0) AS dianmahuaQuantity FROM mro_chezhan c
c.cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
